name: Radioactive
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
Note about strumming patterns: the intro of the song has a more uptempo feel,
but the main body of the song including the chorus is definitely at a slow tempo.

[Intro]
[ch]Am[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]  [ch]G6[/ch]    x3
[ch]Am[/ch]

[Verse 1]
[ch]Am[/ch]          [ch]C[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]
I"m waking up to ash and dust
          [ch]D[/ch]                    [ch]Am[/ch]
I wipe my brow and I sweat my rust
             [ch]C[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]D[/ch]
I"m breathing in the chemicals
[ch]Am[/ch]          [ch]C[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]D[/ch]
I"m breaking in, shaping up, then checking out on the prison bus
[ch]Am[/ch]        [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]
This is it, the apocalypse
[ch]D[/ch]
Whoa

[Chorus 1]
           [ch]Am[/ch]            [ch]C[/ch]    
I"m waking up, I feel it in my bones
 [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]
Enough to make my systems blow
[ch]Am[/ch]                     [ch]C[/ch]
Welcome to the new age, to the new age
[ch]G[/ch]                      [ch]D[/ch]
Welcome to the new age, to the new age
[ch]Am[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]D[/ch]
  Whoa, whoa, I"m radioactive, radioactive
[ch]Am[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]D[/ch]
  Whoa, whoa, I"m radioactive, radioactive

[Verse 2]
[ch]Am[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]
I raise my flags, don my clothes
          [ch]D[/ch]                    [ch]Am[/ch]
It"s a revolution, I suppose
              [ch]C[/ch]                  [ch]G[/ch]
We"re painted red to fit right in
[ch]D[/ch]
Whoa
[ch]Am[/ch]          [ch]C[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]D[/ch]
I"m breaking in, shaping up, then checking out on the prison bus
[ch]Am[/ch]        [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]
This is it, the apocalypse
[ch]D[/ch]
Whoa

[Chorus 2]
           [ch]Am[/ch]            [ch]C[/ch]
I"m waking up, I feel it in my bones
 [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]
Enough to make my systems blow
[ch]Am[/ch]                     [ch]C[/ch]
Welcome to the new age, to the new age
[ch]G[/ch]                      [ch]D[/ch]
Welcome to the new age, to the new age
[ch]Am[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]D[/ch]
  Whoa, whoa, I"m radioactive, radioactive
[ch]Am[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]D[/ch]
  Whoa, whoa, I"m radioactive, radioactive

[Bridge]
[ch]Am[/ch]         [ch]Cmaj7[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]           [ch]D[/ch]
All systems go, sun hasn"t died
[ch]Am[/ch]         [ch]Cmaj7[/ch]  [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]
Deep in my bones, straight from inside

[Chorus 3]
           [ch]Am[/ch]            [ch]C[/ch]
I"m waking up, I feel it in my bones
 [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]
Enough to make my systems blow
[ch]Am[/ch]                     [ch]C[/ch]
Welcome to the new age, to the new age
[ch]G[/ch]                      [ch]D[/ch]
Welcome to the new age, to the new age
[ch]Am[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]D[/ch]
  Whoa, whoa, I"m radioactive, radioactive
[ch]Am[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]D[/ch]
  Whoa, whoa, I"m radioactive, radioactive
